title: Evaluation of optimised heparins as novel therapeutics for Alzheimers Disease
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText: Further preclinical development of candidate compounds as inhibitors of BACE1 for treatment of AD Healthcare,Pharmaceuticals and Medical Biotechnology Economic
findingsText: Developed candidate compounds as inhibitors of BACE1 for treatment of AD Further translational research Healthcare,Pharmaceuticals and Medical Biotechnology
